title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Navigate cloud compute with Fargate and ECS Managed Instances (CNS342)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Fargate 和 ECS 托管实例导航云计算 (CNS342)
abstract: Amazon ECS offers multiple compute options that enable architects to optimize for performance, cost, and operational requirements. This session provides a comprehensive guide to using AWS Fargate, Amazon ECS Managed Instances, and self-managed EC2 with Amazon ECS. We’ll dive into the technical architecture, operational models, and cost implications of each compute type through real world scenarios. You’ll learn the inflection points when matching compute options to specific application patterns including batch processing, web services, and data intensive workloads.
abstract_cn: Amazon ECS 提供多种计算选项，使架构师能够针对性能、成本和运营需求进行优化。本会议提供使用 AWS Fargate、Amazon ECS 托管实例和带有 Amazon ECS 的自管理 EC2 的综合指南。我们将通过真实场景深入探讨每种计算类型的技术架构、运营模式和成本影响。您将学习在将计算选项与特定应用程序模式（包括批处理、Web 服务和数据密集型工作负载）匹配时的关键决策点。
